en: They stood in front of the door.
k. construction implement for a secret compartment

ngiemboon: Mé kwɛ̌ ndá láʼ tà ḿbéŋe ncwò lê ntyèen.
en: We built the traditional house until crossing the entrance with the bamboo pith.

ngiemboon: À sɔ̌g menzsǒ mé tà ńtyɛ́.
en: He washed his clothes until they were scoured.
